title: Provide support for compile time checks of WPF bindings
body: We already have intellisense for the Bindings when setting the design time DataContext on a Window.This however is not enough.

comments.body: Can we have the XAML x:bind back ported to WPF

MVC started out with dynamic bindings and moved to compile time checks for bindings because it is SO much better.
See for more examples http://paulstovell.com/blog/six-years-of-wpf
This is a very good idea but it needs to be an opt-in feature per View. Some views benefit from compile time checking others are dynamic on purpose.
